20110120222033.000|20110120222036.000|TR0|Korea says high-level talks will happen

20110120222118.000|20110120222120.000|TR0|BLITZER:  The future of health care reform 
20110120222120.000|20110120222123.000|TR0|is on Jack Cafferty's mind.  He's here 
20110120222123.000|20110120222125.000|TR0|with "The Cafferty File" -- Jack.
20110120222125.000|20110120222127.000|TR0|
20110120222127.000|20110120222129.000|TR0|JACK CAFFERTY, CNN ANCHOR:  It may be the 
20110120222129.000|20110120222132.000|TR0|law of land, but there are a lot of people 
20110120222132.000|20110120222134.000|TR0|out there who want to get rid of the 
20110120222134.000|20110120222136.000|TR0|health care reform law.  The House voted 
20110120222136.000|20110120222138.000|TR0|245 to 189 to repeal President Obama's 
20110120222138.000|20110120222140.000|TR0|signature legislation, with some Democrats 
20110120222140.000|20110120222143.000|TR0|joining in a unanimous Republican vote.
20110120222143.000|20110120222145.000|TR0|
20110120222145.000|20110120222147.000|TR0|The bill is unlikely to see the light of 
20110120222147.000|20110120222149.000|TR0|day in the Senate, and if it ever gets to 
20110120222149.000|20110120222152.000|TR0|President Obama's desk, he would likely 
20110120222152.000|20110120222154.000|TR0|veto it.
20110120222154.000|20110120222156.000|TR0|
20110120222156.000|20110120222158.000|TR0|Republicans acknowledge that repeal is 
20110120222158.000|20110120222201.000|TR0|highly unlikely, so they may try to cut 
20110120222201.000|20110120222203.000|TR0|funding for parts of the law or eliminate 
20110120222203.000|20110120222205.000|TR0|specific provisions.  Democrats call the 
20110120222205.000|20110120222207.000|TR0|repeal vote a gimmick.  Really?  Not 
20110120222207.000|20110120222210.000|TR0|exactly.
20110120222210.000|20110120222212.000|TR0|
20110120222212.000|20110120222214.000|TR0|It's not just House Republicans who are 
20110120222214.000|20110120222216.000|TR0|against the health care reform law, not by 
20110120222216.000|20110120222219.000|TR0|a long shot.  More than half the states in 
20110120222219.000|20110120222221.000|TR0|this country are challenging the law in 
20110120222221.000|20110120222223.000|TR0|court.  Another six states have now joined 
20110120222223.000|20110120222225.000|TR0|a Florida lawsuit bringing the total in 
20110120222225.000|20110120222228.000|TR0|that case to 26 states, plus Virginia has 
20110120222228.000|20110120222230.000|TR0|filed a separate lawsuit and Oklahoma says 
20110120222230.000|20110120222232.000|TR0|it plans to do the same.
20110120222232.000|20110120222234.000|TR0|
20110120222234.000|20110120222236.000|TR0|The states insist the law is 
20110120222236.000|20110120222239.000|TR0|unconstitutional, because it forces people 
20110120222239.000|20110120222241.000|TR0|to buy health insurance.  They might have 
20110120222241.000|20110120222243.000|TR0|a point.  A Thompson/Reuters poll shows 
20110120222243.000|20110120222245.000|TR0|that an overwhelming 65 percent of doctors 
20110120222245.000|20110120222248.000|TR0|say that health care reform will mean 
20110120222248.000|20110120222250.000|TR0|worse patient cares in the next time 
20110120222250.000|20110120222252.000|TR0|years.  Only 18 percent of doctors in the 
20110120222252.000|20110120222254.000|TR0|poll think that the new law will make 
20110120222254.000|20110120222257.000|TR0|patient health care better.
20110120222257.000|20110120222259.000|TR0|
20110120222259.000|20110120222301.000|TR0|Those are pretty stunning numbers, better 
20110120222301.000|20110120222303.000|TR0|than 3 to 1.  We're talking about doctors 
20110120222303.000|20110120222306.000|TR0|here.       Finally, most of the American 
20110120222306.000|20110120222308.000|TR0|people aren't sold on this thing, either.

20110120222958.000|20110120223000.000|TR0|domestic terrorism.  Authorities rerouted

20110120223006.000|20110120223009.000|TR0|Quantico, Virginia.
20110120223009.000|20110120223011.000|TR0|
20110120223011.000|20110120223013.000|TR0|A teenage girl is denying she had sex with 
20110120223013.000|20110120223015.000|TR0|Silvio Berlusconi despite contradictory 
20110120223015.000|20110120223018.000|TR0|court documents.  But the girl's former 
20110120223018.000|20110120223020.000|TR0|roommate claims the then 17-year-old told 
20110120223020.000|20110120223022.000|TR0|her she was often at the prime minister's 
20110120223022.000|20110120223024.000|TR0|house, ate dinner and danced for him and 
20110120223024.000|20110120223027.000|TR0|had intimate relations.  The girl, 
20110120223027.000|20110120223029.000|TR0|nicknamed Ruby, also says she received 
20110120223029.000|20110120223031.000|TR0|more than $9,000 from the prime minister 
20110120223031.000|20110120223033.000|TR0|last Valentine's Day to help her.
20110120223033.000|20110120223036.000|TR0|

20110120225123.000|20110120225125.000|TR0|
20110120225125.000|20110120225127.000|TR0|The question this hour: "What does it mean 
20110120225127.000|20110120225129.000|TR0|if more than half the states are fighting

20110120225134.000|20110120225136.000|TR0|reform law.

20110120225350.000|20110120225353.000|TR0|After the Gulf Coast oil spill, could the 
20110120225353.000|20110120225355.000|TR0|Alaska pipeline be the next scene of an 
20110120225355.000|20110120225357.000|TR0|environmental disaster?  CNN investigates 
20110120225357.000|20110120225359.000|TR0|wear and tear on this critical source of 
20110120225359.000|20110120225401.000|TR0|America's fuel supply.
20110120225401.000|20110120225404.000|TR0|
20110120225404.000|20110120225406.000|TR0|And the inside story of the FBI's huge 
20110120225406.000|20110120225408.000|TR0|bust of alleged mobsters.
20110120225408.000|20110120225410.000|TR0|
20110120225410.000|20110120225413.000|TR0|(COMMERCIAL BREAK)
20110120225413.000|20110120225415.000|TR0|
20110120225415.000|20110120225417.000|TR0|BLITZER:  The pipeline responsible for 
20110120225417.000|20110120225419.000|TR0|supplying a major portion of U.S. oil is 
20110120225419.000|20110120225422.000|TR0|up and running after an unprecedented 
20110120225422.000|20110120225424.000|TR0|shutdown this month.  The 800-mile Trans 
20110120225424.000|20110120225426.000|TR0|Alaska Pipeline pumps about 11 percent of 
20110120225426.000|20110120225428.000|TR0|the nation's oil from wells in Alaska's 
20110120225428.000|20110120225431.000|TR0|North Slope, down to the Port of Valdez.  
20110120225431.000|20110120225433.000|TR0|But operations came to a screeching halt 
20110120225433.000|20110120225435.000|TR0|when a leak was detected at pump station 
20110120225435.000|20110120225437.000|TR0|one in Prudhoe Bay.
20110120225437.000|20110120225440.000|TR0|
20110120225440.000|20110120225442.000|TR0|Crews had to jerry-rig a pipe to bypass 
20110120225442.000|20110120225444.000|TR0|the leak.  BP is one of the companies that 
20110120225444.000|20110120225446.000|TR0|owns the Trans Alaska Pipeline.  Critics 
20110120225446.000|20110120225449.000|TR0|say BP has been pushing the pipeline 
20110120225449.000|20110120225451.000|TR0|consortium to cut corners on maintenance.
20110120225451.000|20110120225453.000|TR0|
20110120225453.000|20110120225455.000|TR0|CNN Investigative Reporter Drew Griffin 
20110120225455.000|20110120225457.000|TR0|has been following the story.  Drew is 
20110120225457.000|20110120225500.000|TR0|joining us now with the latest.
20110120225500.000|20110120225502.000|TR0|
20110120225502.000|20110120225504.000|TR0|What's going on, Drew?
20110120225504.000|20110120225506.000|TR0|
20110120225506.000|20110120225509.000|TR0|DREW GRIFFIN, CNN INVESTIGATIVE REPORTER:  
20110120225509.000|20110120225511.000|TR0|Wolf, a lot of the criticism has come from 
20110120225511.000|20110120225513.000|TR0|Congress itself.  Senator Mark Begich of 
20110120225513.000|20110120225515.000|TR0|Alaska is the latest now to call for a 
20110120225515.000|20110120225518.000|TR0|hearing.  He wants to know, among other 
20110120225518.000|20110120225520.000|TR0|things, if maintenance cuts or delays are 
20110120225520.000|20110120225522.000|TR0|causing all this.
20110120225522.000|20110120225524.000|TR0|
20110120225524.000|20110120225527.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)      GRIFFIN 
20110120225527.000|20110120225529.000|TR0|(voice-over):  This latest leak led to the 
20110120225529.000|20110120225531.000|TR0|shutdown of the Trans Alaska Pipeline for 
20110120225531.000|20110120225533.000|TR0|more than three days and kept more than 
20110120225533.000|20110120225536.000|TR0|two million barrels of oil from market.  
20110120225536.000|20110120225538.000|TR0|Thirty years of wear and tear on this 
20110120225538.000|20110120225540.000|TR0|engineering marvel, combined with what 
20110120225540.000|20110120225542.000|TR0|critics say is declining maintenance, may 
20110120225542.000|20110120225544.000|TR0|be creating a recipe for environment 
20110120225544.000|20110120225547.000|TR0|disaster in a very hard to reach location.
20110120225547.000|20110120225549.000|TR0|
20110120225549.000|20110120225551.000|TR0|That is the belief of Fairbanks state 
20110120225551.000|20110120225553.000|TR0|representative David Guttenberg, who told 
20110120225553.000|20110120225556.000|TR0|us earlier this summer he sees a string of 
20110120225556.000|20110120225558.000|TR0|small mishaps and missed maintenance 
20110120225558.000|20110120225600.000|TR0|deadlines as a sign the pipeline's 
20110120225600.000|20110120225602.000|TR0|principle owner, BP, is willing to risk 
20110120225602.000|20110120225605.000|TR0|Alaska's pristine environment to save 
20110120225605.000|20110120225607.000|TR0|money.

20110120225616.000|20110120225618.000|TR0|corners were cut. Is the same corporate

20110120225627.000|20110120225629.000|TR0|believe has been the problem, yes.
20110120225629.000|20110120225631.000|TR0|

20110120225638.000|20110120225640.000|TR0|say they've been largely ignored until the

20110120225725.000|20110120225727.000|TR0|GRIFFIN:  Alyeska's official dispute

20110120225739.000|20110120225741.000|TR0|600 feet of buried piping with new

20110120225743.000|20110120225745.000|TR0|pipeline official in charge of maintenance
